title: US puts normalizing relations with Russia among ‘core interests’
description: Washington’s newly released National Security Strategy calls for a swift end to the Ukraine conflict and normalizing relations with Russia Read Full Article at RT.com
content: The US has placed the restoration of normal ties with Russia and a rapid end to the Ukraine conflict at the center of its newly released National Security Strategy, presenting both aims as among Amer… [+2085 chars]
